description:
Kurumizawa Satanichia McDowell, known as Satanichia, she puts on airs and aims at being a great devil however she is a naïve and dimwitted devil and her little mischief usually ends in failure. Since Satanichia is so naïve and innocent she becomes the main target of Raphiel sadist jokes.
Like the other girls Satanicha came to earth to attend a human high school and learn about humans after graduating for her Devil School in the lower world
name: Kurumizawa Satanichia McDowell
